mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from product order by product_idx desc) a) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
select product_content from product where product_idx = #{product_idx}
select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from product where product_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by product_idx desc) a) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
select count(*) from product where product_title like '%'||#{search}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into product values( product_idx.nextval, #{product_category}, #{product_title}, #{product_price}, #{product_content}, #{product_img}, sysdate, 'n')
mapper.update: update product set product_category = #{product_category}, product_title = #{product_title}, product_price = #{product_price}, product_content = #{product_content}, product_img = #{product_img} where product_idx = #{product_idx}
